citeinfo.title: Rhode Island Geographic Information System (RIGIS) Data Distribution System

descript.abstract: Main sewer lines, force mains, and interceptors for public and private sewer system based on the best available information supplied by municipalities and utilities. Detailed house to house connections not shown.
descript.purpose: Statewide inventory and land use planning

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

citeinfo.title: Sewer Lines; s44usl96
citeinfo.othercit: RIDOT has contributed this data into the Rhode Island Geographic Information System Database

procstep.procdesc: Road centerlines were coded for pipe existence cross country pipes were transferred to 24000 base with a zts and hand digitized from tablet.

Information was supplied either electronically as shapefiles, CAD files, PDF maps, image files or hardcopy maps. Electronic data in the form of shapefiles or CAD files contained data that were not used to generate the sewerlines for this coverage. Locational data extracted to map the service lines. Hardcopy maps electronically scanned, imported into ArcMap and georeferenced . Wastewater Facilities Plans submitted to RIDEM for review used where no other sources were available. The new sewer lines were then drawn to conform to the road coverage of RI base maps. The original 1996 RIGIS dataset was unaltered except where major discrepancies between the existing and new updates were observed. Sewer services in Providence are assumed to be available throughout the town and are drawn concurrent with streets. No updates were made to areas or towns that did not provide maps.

procstep.procdesc: Data contributed to RIGIS by the Rhode Island Department of Environmental Management. Metadata were reviewed, merged with prior 1996 version, minor corrections made to formatting and content, RIGIS distribution information added.
